programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: In Sheffield, Dan and his team are hoping to do deals on some designer jewellery, an ancient coin that could be over 700 years old, and a jewel-encrusted luxury watch. In London, pawnbroking duo Nathan and Debbs go to look at a pair of vintage toy replica racing cars and an unusual piano accordion in mint condition.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: At Pickwicks in London, Nathan John Finch and Debs Franklin are doing deals on a pair of original fish paintings and an original theatre organ with a £35,000 asking price.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two first-time buyers in Manchester. Interior designer Abigail Carpe is looking for a two-bedroom period home in the southern suburbs with a limited budget, while David Isaac has £235,000 to spend on a city-centre pad to share with his girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with a family who were looking for a seaside home in Broadstairs, Kent, and also revisit Tara Magee and Alastair Murray, who were struggling to buy their first home together in Edinburgh, despite having a budget of £600,000.(n)

programme.title: Coast vs Country
programme.desc: Paul and Mandy search Sussex for their first home together, big enough for her teenagers and to entertain friends. But while she wants the countryside, he feels the pull of the sea.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The guests spend their final night in Christine Adams' medieval Ware Hall in Norfolk - and while Adam is won over the romance and history, Steve and Karen find the dust too much.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Catherine Williams creates a menu inspired by South America for the first dinner party of the week in Leeds. She is joined by Garth Kirsten-Landman from South Africa, company administrator Louise Emmerson, banker Sam Appleby and property developer Diane Jones. Straight-talker Garth causes widespread offence, but the host maintains a positive mood with a painting session.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Garth Kirsten-Landman cooks kangaroo meat as he hosts the second night in Leeds. However, after his sexist jokes and inaccurate age-guessing on day one, the South African has a lot of making up to do - but things get off to a bad start when he apologises for his meal before it has even been served.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Banker Sam Appleby wears a Henry VIII costume, complete with enormous codpiece, for his best-of-British-themed evening, as he hosts the third dinner party in Leeds. Property developer Diane's Margaret Thatcher costume causes some conflict, but there is some brief harmony when a busker arrives to lead the guests in singing a Beatles song.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Company administrator Louise Emmerson serves a Mediterranean menu inspired by her former mother-in-law, featuring Madrid chicken and aubergine bake. However, the guests are not impressed by the food, and Sam Appleby stokes the simmering feud between Diane Jones and the host, much to the shock of the other diners.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Property developer Diane Jones hosts the final dinner party in Leeds, and her guests have high expectations for the evening. She rustles up Greek filo pastries and cod in Italian sauce as well as entertaining her diners with Brazilian dancing on the lawn, before the winner of the £1,000 prize is announced.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Brick Hotel in Newtown, Pennsylvania, where the staff have had enough of owner Verindar, who runs the establishment like an angry tyrant. Can Gordon convince her to value her loyal workers and entice customers back to this landmark hotel?.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In the conclusion of Gordon Ramsay's visit to La Galleria 33 in Boston, Massachusetts, he confronts sisters Rita and Lisa with an ultimatum, and finds himself stuck in a war between the waiters, chefs and owners over who is to blame for the Italian restaurant's failings.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with two sets of first-time buyers - Isobel Phillips and Chris Martin, who were desperate to find their dream family home in the Cotswolds before getting married, and Claire Winship, a student looking to spend her £1.7million budget on a riverside apartment on London's South Bank.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two sets of first-time buyers who are struggling to find homes. In Southampton, Jenny and Tom are keen to move out of their cramped rental property and into a house of their own, but they are facing fierce competition and a fast market. Meanwhile, in the New Forest, Georgie and Will are desperate to live together after seven years of being a couple. However, with Will working in Belgium during the week, the pair are finding suitable properties are snapped up before they have even had the chance to view them.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Three young men from different walks of life are brought in to the A&E department of St George's Hospital in London, including 17-year-old Shea, who has serious stab wounds and is sent to a high dependency unit. Fellow 17-year-old Bob arrives after impaling his leg on a fence while taking a shortcut home from his boys' school, and 33-year-old James is brought in by ambulance after fainting at home.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy panel show's version of the words-and-numbers quiz, with David Mitchell and Cariad Lloyd, taking on Jon Richardson and Russell Howard. Sam Simmons joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week. The programme captures their instant reactions and lively discussions from the comfort of their own homes.(n)

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Two more singletons choose a date from a selection of six naked people, who will be revealed to them one body part at a time. Wolverhampton DJ Darryl hopes stripping everything back will him meet his ideal partner, while former ballet dancer Ania, from Preston, is tired of investing valuable time on people only to be disappointed when the clothes come off and has decided that being upfront is the key to relationship success. Anna Richardson hosts.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: This edition explores the challenges that inevitably come with the end of life, and how the emergency services have to learn to cope when dealing with death on a daily basis. In Warrington, paramedics arrive at the home of a man having a suspected cardiac arrest, and with CPR already being carried out and a defibrillator at close hand, the man is given the best possible chance of survival. Plus, ambulance staff and police officers discuss being called to sudden deaths.(n)

programme.title: The World's Weirdest Weather
programme.desc: Another look at some of the globe's most bizarre climatic conditions and the science behind them, including a vast cave system with its own weather, a desert in Brazil where people swim in lagoons while surrounded by huge sand dunes, and a lake in Argentina with water than can look like concrete. Plus, glow-in-the-dark waves in the Californian city of San Diego, a Canadian family who filmed an upside-down rainbow, a 50-year puzzle of mysterious lights in the Michigan sky, and `spider lightning' in Texas.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Noel tries to fix a cocker spaniel's leg problems by fitting two bionic back feet, before launching a series of investigations into what is causing a cat to drag its leg. Plus, a Westie puppy with a fractured knee arrives, but it cannot keep still.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: At Pickwicks in London, Nathan John Finch and Debs Franklin are doing deals on a pair of original fish paintings and an original theatre organ with a £35,000 asking price.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: At Silverstone, James Constantinou test drives a high-performance motorbike on sale for £35,000. Designer handbag expert Claudia Valentin meets `human Ken doll' Rodrigo Alves who is selling his designer luggage and watches so that he can learn to drive. Plus, memorabilia expert Lawrence Pickett appraises a guitar owned by Alvin Stardust's widow signed by members of the Beatles and the Rolling Stones.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: In Sheffield, Dan Hatfield and Ellie Beardmore look at a dazzling diamond-encrusted mobile phone, a rare German clock, a stunning diamond cluster ring and a solid silver Rococo-style bowl. At Nikolas Patrick in London, pawnbroking brothers Charlie and Patrick Devine consider deals on Harry Potter's broomstick and an impressive collection of Manchester United memorabilia.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer revisit past house-hunters, beginning with globe-trotting Matt Rushworth, who was looking forward to settling down near his family in Windsor, Berkshire. They then catch up with Sheffield couple Justin and Deborah, who were seeking a bigger home, but had very different opinions on how to tackle the property to make room for their sports gear.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with Paul and his American bride Alissa, who were looking for a property in Windsor, Berkshire, and revisit Malcolm and Jenny in Wiltshire who wanted a welcoming and cosy atmosphere for their prospective home.(n)

programme.title: Coast vs Country
programme.desc: Kirsty Duffy and David Bull advise Rachel and Charman, who are seeking a fresh start and willing to invest £320,000 on a home somewhere in Devon.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final day of the competition sees the owners of Hotel Commodore, Halebarns House, Ware Hall and the Ardingly Inn meet for the last time to find out what they've been paid and to settle some scores. There are tears, tantrums and bitter rebukes as the payments are revealed before the winner is finally announced.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Water-feature builder Geoff Carter holds the first dinner party of the week in Warrington, Cheshire, and opts for an Asian-themed menu. His guests are science teacher Emma Hoyle, call centre manager Stephen Robinson, beef farmer Alison Davies and Greek teacher Linda Weaver - who upstages the host by trying to fool the other diners.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Call centre manager Stephen Robinson hosts the second night in Warrington, Cheshire, as guests are asked to dress appropriately for his pink and black theme. After a mishap with the main course, Stephen hopes his choral entertainment and raspberry Bakewell slice will be able to rescue the evening and put him in the running for the £1,000 prize.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Beef farmer Alison Davies serves her guests Dyffd, one of her own Hereford cows, as part of her menu for the third dinner party in Warrington, Cheshire. She shows her fellow competitors round her property, but Linda Weaver has an accident in the duck pond.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Science teacher Emma Hoyle hosts the fourth dinner party in Warrington. Both the pili pili prawn starter and the chicken main course prove a success with the other contestants, and a soak in Emma's hot tub at the end of the meal seems to round off the evening perfectly.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Linda Weaver hosts the final night of the culinary competition in Warrington, Cheshire, inviting her fellow diners to a fancy-dress party with a multicultural theme. In a bid to win the £1,000 prize, she also tries to impress her guests with her bagpipe-playing skills, before the winner is announced.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits the Beachfront Inn and Inlet, a Caribbean-style resort hotel in Fort Pierce, Florida. Young and inexperienced owner Brian is making guests' time at the hotel miserable with dusty rooms, late-night concerts and poor service. Can Gordon prevent the business from going under?.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef pulls no punches as he comes to the aid of failing American restaurants.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with two couples who were expecting babies when they first met him. In 2009, Rik and Helen Francis wanted to change their city-centre living in Manchester for a move to a family home in Hale and Altrincham. In 2004, Alison and Phil Clarke were hoping to move from Bolton to Herefordshire to be nearer their relatives.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of pioneering veterinary practice Fitzpatrick Referrals in Surrey, where orthopaedic-neuro veterinary surgeon Noel Fitzpatrick and his team help some of the nation's hardest-to-cure pets using cutting-edge procedures. A man travels through the night to bring his much-loved doberman down from Cumbria to see Noel Fitzpatrick about a diseased spinal cord. Can the professor and his staff bring the canine back to health? Other cases this week are a cocker spaniel rushed in after being hit by a car and a rabbit that needs surgery for a broken ankle.(n)

programme.title: Catching a Killer
programme.desc: Documentary about Thames Valley Police's investigation into the disappearance of 31-year-old mother of three Natalie Hemming on May 1, 2016. The programme has extraordinary access to the officers as they try to work out whether Natalie is alive or dead, and to her family and friends, struggling with the situation unfolding around them, before an arrest is made and the case reaches its heartbreaking conclusion.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay's next stop is Philadelphia, where family-run restaurant Chiarella's is struggling to survive in an area full of thriving Italian eateries. Tommy and Dina Defino's marriage is on the verge of collapse and his sense of personal failure only adds to the troubles of their crisis-ridden business.(n)

programme.desc: Brian O'Shaughnessy and Graham Aldred's first case sees them in a Brighton health spa as they search for assets to seize in pursuit of a £20,000 debt. programme.desc: Documentary about parents prepared to go to extreme lengths to get what they always wanted for their children, including Essex millionaire Irene. However, eldest daughter Samantha has decided to turn her back on her mum's excessive displays of wealth. Cameras also follow 31-year-old stockbroker Bobby, who gives his 11-year-old daughter Lilly Rae anything if it spurs her on to greater success in life.(n)

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman takes inspiration from Game of Thrones as he seeks to form alliances in order to acquire an Xbox One on the biggest shopping day of the year. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Return of the adult animation following the adventures of four young boys - Stan, Cartman, Kenny and Kyle - who live in a bizarre Colorado town, famed for its weird and inexplicable happenings. In the first episode, Cartman becomes enraged by the discovery that the NSA is spying on the American people, and endeavours to expose the secret online.(n)

programme.title: My Mum's Hotter Than Me
programme.desc: Documentary about people who will stop at nothing to outdo their children or grandchildren in the fashion and beauty stakes, finding out whether they are a source of embarrassment or pride for their nearest and dearest. Maruga has taught her twins everything they know and claims they are the Kardashians of the UK, while Amanda loves to compare herself to her much younger 18-year-old granddaughter and Chris is always competing with his daughter Megan on their nights out.(n)

programme.title: Countdown to Murder
programme.sub-title: The Body in the Freezer: Countdown to Murder.
programme.desc: In March 2010, pub landlord Michael Tucker shot his partner Rebecca Thorpe in the head while she was having a bath and hid her body in a chest freezer in one of the outbuildings of his bar in Snettisham, Norfolk. This documentary analyses Tucker's emotional state of mind and the events that led him to kill in cold blood, and includes interviews with Rebecca's father Peter, Jes Fry of the Norfolk and Suffolk major investigation team and consultant forensic psychologist Kerry Daynes.(n)

programme.title: Inside the World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: Journalist Paul Connolly experiences life as an inmate in some of the world's most notorious prisons. He begins by serving time with some of Poland's most dangerous criminals in Piotrkow, a maximum security facility where isolation, strict discipline and zero tolerance keep prisoners locked up for 23 hours a day. Paul learns first-hand about the punishment room where violent inmates are subdued, is subject to an intimate body search, watches as the guards search for contraband, and discovers why inmates are forced to eat meals in their cells.(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Following their painful break-up, Eric and Donna fight over `custody' of their friends. Nostalgic comedy series, starring Topher Grace and Laura Prepon.(n)

Their final case involves a man with a history of mental illness who has reached the end of his tenancy but refuses to leave, and Steve tries to find a solution after a church minister and his mother fail to placate him.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Puppies Make You Laugh Out Loud.
programme.desc: Compilation of internet videos featuring animals doing bizarre and humorous things. Clips include overexcited pups, pilfering pups, pups that fall asleep in their dinner bowls, puppy vloggers, driving pups, and even a look at the latest craze - pups who go into a quivering frenzy at the sight of doorstoppers. Narrator Iain Lee is joined by comedians Dave Spikey, Matt Richardson and Zoe Lyons.(n)

programme.desc: An aide at the American embassy in Paris longs to become a CIA agent, but gets more than he bargained for when he is assigned to assist an trigger-happy secret service operative. The agent leads him on a dangerous journey through the city's underworld as they fight to prevent a terrorist attack on the city. Action thriller, with John Travolta and Jonathan Rhys Meyers.(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: Vigilante Diaries
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding action flick, a team of crime fighters travel the globe as they battle a group of spies, the Armenian mob and a trio of mysterious women with dark intentions(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: After a disastrous summer, Harry returns to begin his fifth year at Hogwarts, one of the toughest he will ever have. A few group of students and parents believe him or Dumbledore that Voldemort is really back, and a never-ending series of articles states that they are insane. On top of that, Dolores Umbridge, the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher, proves to be the nastiest person Harry has ever encountered(n)

programme.title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2
programme.desc: Four lifelong best friends embark on separate paths for their first year of college and the summer beyond(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy fashion magazine(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: LA journalist Steve Lopez begins writing a column about a mentally ill homeless man with a talent for playing the cello. Lopez tries to help improve his life, but finds his new friend's state of mind a stumbling block. Drama(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Based on the true story of how Charlie Wilson, an alcoholic womaniser and Texas congressman, persuaded the CIA to train and arm resistance fighters in Afghanistan to fend off the Soviet Union. With the help of rogue CIA agent, Gust Avrakotos, the two men supplied money, training and a team of military experts that turned the ill-equipped Afghan freedom-fighters into a force that brought the Red Army to a stalemate and set the stage for conflicts in the Middle East that still rage to this day(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: The creation of one of the most memorable books of the 1960s -- and the impact the writing and research would have on its author -- is explored in this drama based on a true story. In 1959, Truman Capote (played by Philip Seymour Hoffman) was a critically acclaimed novelist who had earned a small degree of celebrity for his work when he read a short newspaper item about a multiple murder in a small Kansas town. For some reason, the story fascinated Capote, and he asked William Shawn (Bob Balaban), his editor at The New Yorker, to let him write a piece about the case. Capote had long believed that in the right hands, a true story could be molded into a tale as compelling as any fiction, and he believed this event, in which the brutal and unimaginable was visited upon a community where it was least expected, could be just the right material. Capote traveled to Kansas with his close friend Harper Lee (Catherine Keener), herself becoming a major literary figure with the success of To Kill a Mockingbird, and while Capote's effete and mannered personal style stuck out like a sore thumb in Kansas, in time he gained the trust of Alvin Dewey (Chris Cooper), the Kansas Bureau of Investigation agent investigating the murder of the Clutter family, and with his help Capote's magazine piece grew into a full-length book. Capote also became familiar with the petty criminals who killed the Clutter family, Dick Hickock (Mark Pellegrino) and Perry Smith (Clifton Collins Jr.), and in Smith he found a troubling kindred spirit more like himself than he wanted to admit. After attaining a sort of friendship with Smith under the assumption that the man would be executed before the book was ever published, Capote finds himself forced to directly confront the moral implications of his actions with regards to both his role in the man's death, and the way that he would be remembered. Capote also co-stars Bruce Greenwood as Capote's longtime companion Jack Dunphy, and Amy Ryan as Mary Dewey, Alvin's wife who became a confidante of Capote's(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: A meek young woman emigrates from Ireland to New York City in the 1950s, and finds her heart torn between a magnetic Italian suitor and a charming lad back home(n)

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Danish painter Einar Wegener begins living as a woman named Lili Elbe, and undergoes one of the world's first gender-reassignment surgeries in the 1930s. Lili struggles with her new identity as it strains her marriage to artist Gerda Wegener(n)

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood directs and stars in this compelling tale of the unlikely friendship that develops between a bigoted Korean War veteran and an Asian teen who, under threat from some gangbangers, tries to steal his car: a cherry 1972 Gran Torino(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: This intense and unnerving thriller should make viewers' skin crawl. Ashley Judd stars as an Oklahoma waitress who's battling her own addictive demons. She takes on a whole new set of problems when she gets involved with an unhinged Gulf War vet (Michael Shannon) who's wracked with paranoid delusions involving invasive insects and clandestine military experiments. Directed by William Friedkin and written by Tracy Letts, who adapted his stage play. Harry Connick Jr., Lynn Collins(n)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter retreat to what they believe is a secure sanctuary during a brutal home invasion. Newly divorced Meg Altman (Jodie Foster) and her young daughter Sarah (Kristen Stewart) move into a New York brownstone equipped with a panic room; a hidden chamber built as a sanctuary in the event of unwanted "visitors," unaware of how soon they will need it. When their home is the target of a seamless late-night break-in, Meg and Sarah take a stand from the sanctuary of the panic room, playing a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with three intruders: Burnham (Forest Whitaker), Raoul (Dwight Yoakam) and Junior (Jared Leto), during a brutal home invasion(n)

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: Emotional docudrama about terminally ill New Jersey police officer Laurel Hester, whose 2005 legal battle for the right to pass her pension benefits on to her female life partner became an equal-rights milestone(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, the rebel learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect the King's throne. The outlaw counts upon the support of his band of followers, including his Moorish companion, a drunken priest and the beautiful Maid Marian(n)

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Hilary Swank adds another outstanding characterization to her Oscar-winning résumé. She plays Holly Kennedy, a young widow whose late husband (Gerard Butler) arranged to have 10 letters delivered posthumously to encourage her to carry on with her life. Directed by Richard LaGravenese, who cowrote the moving script with Steven Rogers. The film is an adaptation of Cecelia Ahern's popular first novel, which she wrote when she was 21(n)

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, who dazzled as Jim Morrison in "The Doors" and Doc Holliday in "Tombstone," adds another outstanding real-life characterization to his résumé---John Holmes. This film chronicles the porn star's suspected involvement in a 1981 homicide that left four of his 'friends' dead. The first-rate supporting cast includes Lisa Kudrow, Eric Bogosian, Dylan McDermott and Ted Levine(n)

programme.title: Pale Rider
programme.desc: Director Clint Eastwood draws on his experience to put together a western with winning components: the bad guys are corporate jerks out for a profit at the expense of Mother Nature, the good guys are poor but independent gold miners threatened by the corporation, the hero Preacher (Eastwood) is there to set things right, and he is beyond any of that romance stuff. Preacher's shady past is implied when he first comes into town and keeps his anonymity intact. He is sheltered by an unmarried duo, Hull and Sarah (Michael Moriarty and Carrie Snodgress), and soon pays them back by saving Hull from a few murderous thugs. Caught in the middle of the growing conflict, Preacher rallies the miners into a combative group and then goes on to final showdown in true "high noon" style(n)

programme.title: The Cotton Club
programme.desc: A cornet player at a legendary 1920s-era Harlem nightspot gets caught in the orbit of a notorious gangster and his teenaged mistress(n)

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: NaÏve Texan Joe Buck drifts to New York and, with the help of local wheeler-dealer Enrico 'Ratso' Rizzo, tries to make a living as a gigolo. Drama(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, and Martin Sheen star in this ensemble drama detailing the daring real-life rescue of 33 Chilean miners who were trapped in the San Jose Mine for 69 days in 2010. Patricia Riggen directs from a script by Jose Rivera and Mikko Alanne(n)

programme.title: Just Cause
programme.desc: Mystery thriller in which a Harvard law professor reluctantly gets drawn into the case of a young black man on death row in Florida for the rape and murder of a girl. The lawyer uncovers disturbing facts about the conduct of the police in the case, but just when he seems to have enough evidence to ensure the condemned man's release, events take an unexpected twist(n)

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A paralysed forensics expert teams up with a fresh-faced cop to hunt down a serial killer. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The sleuth investigates the death of a woman whose dying act was to scrawl a number in her blood as a clue. It identifies a storage compartment - about to be auctioned - which had been rented by her late brother. He was the victim of a suspicious accident some months previously, and a link is made between him and the theft of a valuable diamond from his former employer. Nathan Fillon stars.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The team investigates a disabled boy's death in an apartment fire, focusing inquiries not only on a tenant who lived in the same building and had been linked to several previous blazes, but also on the victim's parents, who had struggled to cope with the strain of looking after him. With Jerry Orbach, Dianne Wiest and guest star Rudolph Giuliani.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the case of a woman found bludgeoned to death with a paving slab at a subway station. A petty thief leads them to a man with a history of mental problems, recently released from prison, who confesses to the crime and a previous murder. However, the victim's ex-husband wants to know why the suspect was walking the streets in the first place.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team investigate the death of a hotel employee who plummeted from a balcony, and are alerted to another case by the sound of gunfire. Rushing to the scene, they find a woman who has shot dead a man for attacking her husband - an incident that brings back painful memories for Stella, who once killed a boyfriend in self-defence.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sam reassumes a former identity to trace Abdul Habassa, the leader of a terrorist group in Yemen. However, things become complicated when the detective is given the task of guarding the kidnapped son of a Saudi prince, so Callen and Nate try to get Sam and the hostage to safety before Habaza becomes suspicious.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: An unsuccessful meet-the-parents event leaves Castle and Beckett at odds with each other. However, they soon have to put their differences aside when it becomes apparent they are being followed by a gang of murderers while escorting a witness to safety. Drama, starring Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic.(n)

programme.title: Person of Interest
programme.desc: Reese and Finch assign Shaw to protect a 10-year-old girl who has been secretly recording anyone in her apartment block who looks suspicious, as among the budding spy's tapes is a conversation detailing HR's plans to use the Russian mafia's distribution network to traffic a new drug. Meanwhile, Carter continues her mission to destroy HR, leading her and Reese to realise they are both looking for the same man -a corrupt cop with ties to the Russians. Crime drama, starring Jim Caviezel and Sarah Shahi.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.sub-title: Sunday in the Park with Jorge.
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in a Central Park lake during a Puerto Rican Day parade. The victim turns out to be the wife of a powerful billionaire, and pressure is put on the police to find the culprit quickly. Suspicion falls on the business partner of the victim's husband and a witness comes forward to identify him, making everything seem clear cut - but not for long.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A restaurant owner is beaten to death and Briscoe and Green's investigation leads them to a gang of thrill-seeking teenagers who tried to steal from the victim but ended up killing him. The ensuing case leaves McCoy with a dilemma over whether the accused are old enough to face the death penalty.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac examines the death of a Base jumper seemingly killed when he hit a flock of pigeons, and discovers the victim was in a witness protection programme. Meanwhile, Stella looks into the case of a wealthy man found dead in his car on the day of his daughter's 16th birthday party - and Lindsay is bitten by a cobra at the scene of the crime. Drama, starring Gary Sinister and Melina Kanakaredes.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team goes in search of a stolen radiotherapy canister that could have been used to make a bomb after a man impersonating a Navy Seal dies after being set on fire. Meanwhile, team leader Hetty Lange has been acting strangely and Callen offers to help with whatever is troubling her. Guest starring Claire Forlani (Camelot), with Chris O'Donnell and Linda Hunt.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and the team are perplexed by Hetty's sudden resignation and press Vance and their new team leader Lauren Hunter for more information about what happened to Hetty. Visiting one of her homes for clues, they find mercenaries ransacking the place - and try to track down the man who hired them. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The crew tackles a huge fire at a boarding school that leaves a deep impression on Severide, Dawson takes her exam and Boden's grand plans go awry. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A bystander is killed in a robbery, traumatising his mentally ill wife, who is later suspected of physically abusing their child. The police take the youngster into protective custody, but a lack of evidence forces them to return him home - with tragic consequences. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The body of a teenage girl is found in the boot of a car, and inquiries soon establish she was a bully who enjoyed picking on other girls - leaving Stabler and Benson with a seemingly endless list of suspects to choose from. Hard-hitting drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The drug-addicted daughter of a politician survives a murder attempt by feigning death, but her blackmailing dealer boyfriend is not so lucky. As they investigate, Goren and Eames uncover a trail of deception that leads all the way to City Hall. Detective drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Two male models are found dead in suspicious circumstances - and as the team interrogates the owners of the agency that employed them, dark secrets are exposed behind all the glitz and glamour of the fashion world. Meanwhile, Natalia's abusive ex-husband makes an unwelcome reappearance - and applies for a job at the morgue. Starring David Caruso and Eva La Rue.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The body of a politician is found in an empty house, leading the team to investigate whether he was killed as a consequence of his corrupt policies that led to local residents being forced out of their homes. Crime drama, starring David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: Having previously escaped Voight's grasp, cartel leader Gustav Munoz reappears on the radar when a number of dead bodies are discovered, and his men are suspected of being behind the killings. Commander Perry then throws his weight behind striking a deal with the incarcerated gangster Adres `Pulpo' Diaz, whom Perry believes may be able to lead the team to Munoz. Chicago Fire spin-off, starring Jason Beghe and Sophia Bush.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The writer's plans for a romantic weekend away with Beckett are ruined when a dying man stumbles into his garden and falls into the pool. Investigations lead to a drug syndicate smuggling a toxic substance out of the Hamptons. Meanwhile, Ryan discovers the duo's secret relationship courtesy of a babbling suspect. Crime drama, starring Nathan Fillion, Stana Katic and Seamus Dever.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a violinist with the New York Symphony Orchestra and find the trail leads back to her Svengali-like conductor. However, they have a difficult job getting the case to trial, with a reluctant witness, a suspicious judge and a talented lawyer standing between them and a guilty verdict.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A gang leader is stabbed to death in a prison scuffle, and Briscoe and Green uncover a number of suspects as it becomes clear the victim had numerous enemies on both sides of the law. The investigation results in a charge, but McCoy faces an uphill battle to convict the accused. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac, Hawkes and Lindsay investigate the death of a woman found on a subway train and discover that although her hands and face are covered in blood, she has no obvious injuries. Meanwhile, Danny and Stella visit the home of a playboy bachelor who drowned in his indoor pool - and are surprised to learn he has a wedding-cake decoration lodged in his lung. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates when a navy intelligence commander responsible for tracking the movements of a Venezuelan politician disappears. Concerned the abduction may lead to a future assassination attempt, the special agents race to find the missing officer, while protecting the foreign dignitary's life.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The author investigates when a Father Christmas impersonator dies, apparently while flying over Central Park. The man is found to have been shot and identified as a former business shark, who had become a reformed character helping local residents fight against eviction. Meanwhile, Castle and Beckett prepare for their first holiday season together.(n)

programme.title: Person of Interest
programme.desc: The Machine has a special mission for Root and Shaw as part of a two-pronged offensive against an organisation that it has identified as a danger, while Finch sends Reese to go and find Shaw when he is unable to contact her. Finch then sets to work on the latest number issued by the computer, which belongs to New York public administrator employee Timothy Sloan, who has been investigating the death of his foster brother from a supposed heroin overdose. Jim Caviezel and Michael Emerson star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the case of a gay man beaten to death during the abduction of his adopted infant son. At first they suspect the victim's wealthy partner may be complicit in the crime - until information about the child's birth mother and homophobic biological father prompts them to pursue a different line of inquiry.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A pregnant loan officer is found murdered in the boot of her car and the trail leads to drugs and a professional basketball player, whose ties to the victim appear to extend beyond the financial deal she approved for him. Detective drama, with Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Hawkes is accused of killing someone in a bar-room brawl, and seemingly irrefutable evidence is produced against him. Mac and the team are taken off the case, but refuse to accept he is guilty and ponder whether anyone has a motive to frame him. Meanwhile, Stella and Danny answer a call reporting a body found in a peep-show booth. Gary Sinister and Hill Harper star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Hetty confronts Alexa Comescu and tells her Callen is dead, but the crime boss knows she is lying. Meanwhile, the agents search for their leader in Romania hoping to confirm she is alive, but when they mount a rescue attempt one of the team is shot. Real-time episode of the crime drama, starring Linda Hunt, Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The CEO of a software company linked to a cyber-attack against the Department of Defence is kidnapped, and Kensi and Deeks go undercover to protect the man's family after fears over their safety. Meanwhile, Callen continues to research his past.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Public works employee Luis Valdez is found stabbed to death in a ditch by the side of a road. He had recently visited the locations of several unsolved murders, so a theory is proposed that Valdez was on to the killer and was murdered to keep him quiet. To build a case, the team re-examines the evidence of the cold cases, using modern techniques, but this prompts the serial killer involved to come out of retirement. Crime drama, starring Corey Stoll and Alfred Molina.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a six-year-old boy who is believed to have collapsed during an exorcism at a late-night church service. However, forensics reveal the victim was smothered before the rite took place, casting suspicion on his foster parents and social worker. Starring Christopher Meloni, Ice-T and Richard Belzer.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Lazy-Hazy-Crazy Days. Summer isn't the only thing that's over and done with as Gilmore Girls begins its third season. Chances are that Lorelai (Lauren Graham) will never be able to marry Christopher (David Sutcliffe), the father of her teenage daughter Rory (Alexis Bledel); Christopher must now devote his time to his "ex" Sherry, who is pregnant with his child. As for Rory, she has returned from her brief sojourn to Washington, D.C., to begin her final year at Chilton prep school -- and to make what she thinks will be her final decision concerning the two men in her life, Dean (Jared Padalecki) and Jess (Milo Ventimiglia). Elsewhere in Stars Hollow, Lorelai's scatterbrained friend Sookie (Melissa McCarthy) settles into domesticity with new hubby Jackson (Jackson Douglas); and the crotchety Taylor tries to orchestrate the town's first annual End-of-Summer Madness Festival, despite being laid up with a broken leg. Senator Barbara Boxer puts in a cameo appearance in a scene where she matches wits with the estimable Paris Geller (Liza Weil)(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A rag-tag group of con artists and ex-cons team up for the heist to end all heists in this high-profile remake of the 1960 Rat Pack favorite. As with its predecessor, Ocean's Eleven opens with its titular hero Danny Ocean (George Clooney stepping into the Frank Sinatra role) eager for a new challenge. The similarities to the original end there, as Ocean conspires with his old pal Rusty Ryan (Brad Pitt) to rob 150 million dollars from an underground vault that serves three of Las Vegas' biggest casinos. Between the two of them, they recruit nine other men, each with his own criminal specialty, to assist in the mission: moneyman Reuben Tishkoff (Elliot Gould), card dealer Frank (Bernie Mac), pickpocket Linus (Matt Damon), aging con artist Saul (Carl Reiner), British explosives pro Basher (Don Cheadle), techie Dell (Eddie Jemison), rude-boy brothers Virgil (Casey Affleck) and Turk (Scott Caan), and professional acrobat Yen (Shaobo Qin). What Ocean doesn't tell the group is that there's another reason he's coordinating the heist: the three casinos they're robbing are all owned by ruthless gambling mogul Terry Benedict (Andy Garcia), who just happens to be married to Ocean's former love Tess (Julia Roberts). Ocean's Eleven was updated by scribe Ted Griffin and marked the third feature shot by director Steven Soderbergh under the alias Peter Andrews(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: The late Tony Scott's remake of the 1974 thriller, starring John Travolta and Denzel Washington. It's a day that the passengers on a New York subway train are unlikely to forget. And it's one that could rescue the professional life of subway employee Walter Garber, whose glittering career has been derailed by allegations of corruption. Garber is languishing on duty as a train dispatcher when all hell breaks loose after one of the Lexington Avenue line trains is hijacked by a gang led by the supremely self-assured, calmly ruthless Ryder. Ryder issues a demand for $10m and makes it clear that he won't hesitate to kill anyone who gets in his way. Garber and NYPD hostage negotiator Lieutenant Camonetti attempt to get to grips with the crisis but, as events progress, suspicions arise as to whether there's more to the hijacking than first meets the eye. Also starring James Gandolfini as New York's mayor and Luis Guzmán as a disgruntled subway worker who has joined Ryder's gang(n)

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: Roland Emmerich's blockbuster stars Dennis Quaid as climatologist Jack Hall; a lone voice predicting that global warming will lead to a new ice age. He is ridiculed for his views, but his fears swiftly come true when a dramatic temperature rise in the Antarctic causes the world's weather to go mad, with tornadoes devastating Los Angeles, Britain literally flash-frozen and New York first inundated by floods and then overwhelmed by a killer cold snap. A few survivors, including Jack's son Sam, take refuge in a library and Jack sets out on a desperate mission to save them. The action-packed film (which won a BAFTA for its stunning special effects) may have compressed and dramatised the effects of global warming but, disturbingly, the basic science Emmerich uses in the film to advance the plot isn't that far removed from the increasing dangers the world faces today(n)

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: A group of young cowhands, led by Billy the Kid, are deputised to hunt down the murderer of their rancher-boss. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted(n)

programme.title: Young Guns II
programme.desc: Only three of the original five "young guns" -- Billy the Kid (Emilio Estevez), Jose Chavez y Chavez (Lou Diamond Phillips), and Doc Scurlock (Kiefer Sutherland) -- return in Young Guns II, which is the story of Billy the Kid and his race to safety in Old Mexico while being trailed by a group of government agents led by Pat Garrett (William Petersen). Along the way, Billy's crew gains three new recruits: Arkansas Dave Rudabaugh (Christian Slater), Tom O'Folliard (Balthazar Getty), and Hendry French (Alan Ruck). Though the film suffers from an uneven script, many performances -- particularly Slater's -- are surprisingly strong, and the movie looks great. The theme song, "Blaze of Glory," is performed by Jon Bon Jovi in his first solo appearance; the rocker also has a cameo in the film(n)

programme.title: The Homesman
programme.desc: A strong-willed woman recruits a loathsome drifter to help transport three insane women across the unforgiving Nebraska Territories so that they may find sanctuary with a compassionate minister and his wife in this drama directed and co-written by Tommy Lee Jones. Driven to madness by the harsh realities of pioneer life, three women (Grace Gummer, Miranda Otto, and Sonja Richter) living on the outskirts of the American frontier are rescued from certain death by pious Mary Bee Cuddy (Hilary Swank), who selflessly takes on the task of transporting them to safety. Along the way, Mary Bee encounters a low-life named George Briggs (Tommy Lee Jones) with his head in a noose. In exchange for helping her transport the women, Mary Bee frees the scruffy stranger, and together the group heads east. In the course of their arduous journey, however, they will encounter ruthless bandits and vengeful Native Americans. Meanwhile, the greatest test to their resolve may be the harsh winter that's blowing in fast. Meryl Streep, John Lithgow, Hailee Steinfeld, William Fichtner, Tim Blake Nelson, and James Spader co-star(n)

programme.title: The Son
programme.desc: No Prisoners. An enemy forces young Eli to question his loyalties in 1849. In 1915, the McCulloughs' past comes back to haunt them with deadly results(n)

programme.title: The Son
programme.desc: The Buffalo Hunter. Young Eli makes a choice with dangerous consequences in 1849. In 1915, the McCulloughs deal with a tragedy, while Jeannie seeks to save the family(n)

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: Listen Judge. The boys turn from vagrancy, to repair work, to cooking in "Listen, Judge"(n)

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: Slippery Silks. The Three Stooges play carpenters who inherits a fancy dress shop in this fast-paced 2-reel farce directed by comedy expert Jack White (using the pseudonym of "Preston Black"). Their fashion show -- based on furniture! -- climaxes in the inevitable pie throwing chaos with the redoubtable Symona Boniface as the chief victim. Slippery Silks was arguably Jack White's finest contribution to the team. Formerly associated with short subject studio Educational, White was the older brother of Stooges producer Jules White(n)

programme.title: King of the Grill-Wood-Fired Cooking
programme.desc: Traeger, the Original Wood Pellet Grill, turns the raw potential of uncooked food into phenomenal food with wood-fired appeal. See what makes a Traeger tick, and how its 6-in-1 versatility transcends the capabilities of conventional propane(n)

programme.desc: Lose weight while eating your favorite food – thin film strip activates in 20 seconds for complete appetite control(n)

programme.desc: Paid Programming(n)

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The Most Unforgettable Characters. While taking a correspondence course in fiction writing, Radar takes notes on the strange people and events around him. He'll need a big note book!(n)

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: 38 Across. April 1953: The entire camp obsesses over the answer to a difficult crossword puzzle clue, and goes to remarkable lengths to find out what it is(n)

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: A bitter Vietnam veteran snaps when he is goaded by a small-town sheriff, and goes to explosive lengths to get revenge. Action(n)

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: A group of young cowhands, led by Billy the Kid, are deputised to hunt down the murderer of their rancher-boss. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted(n)

programme.title: Young Guns II
programme.desc: Only three of the original five "young guns" -- Billy the Kid (Emilio Estevez), Jose Chavez y Chavez (Lou Diamond Phillips), and Doc Scurlock (Kiefer Sutherland) -- return in Young Guns II, which is the story of Billy the Kid and his race to safety in Old Mexico while being trailed by a group of government agents led by Pat Garrett (William Petersen). Along the way, Billy's crew gains three new recruits: Arkansas Dave Rudabaugh (Christian Slater), Tom O'Folliard (Balthazar Getty), and Hendry French (Alan Ruck). Though the film suffers from an uneven script, many performances -- particularly Slater's -- are surprisingly strong, and the movie looks great. The theme song, "Blaze of Glory," is performed by Jon Bon Jovi in his first solo appearance; the rocker also has a cameo in the film(n)

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Academy Award nominee Harrison Ford stars as the wrongly convicted Dr. Richard Kimble, and Academy Award winner Tommy Lee Jones is U.S. Marshal Sam Gerard, his relentless pursuer, in this all-time classic intense thriller based on the hit television series of the 1960s, The Fugitive. Kimble had the perfect life - a beautiful wife, medical career, an expensive townhouse - a perfect life until the night his wife was murdered, died in his arms and he was convicted of the crime. On his way to the penitentiary, Kimble escapes. Now, like hunted prey, he keeps running, determined only to find his wife's murderer. Caught in a nightmare from which he cannot awaken, Dr. Richard Kimble is the fugitive(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Terror By Night. When a diamond is stolen on a train and the son of its owner is murdered, Sherlock Holmes must discover which of his suspicious fellow passengers is responsible. Basil Rathbone(n)

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: He told us he'd be back... and he wasn't lying! Arnold Schwarzenegger returned to his most famous role in explosive fashion in this blockbuster sequel that cost over $200 million to make. The T-800 comes back from the future to protect the resistance leader John Connor one last time from a superior female terminatrix in the form of Kristanna Loken. Also stars Nick Stahl and Claire Danes(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Director Michael Bay returns with his second instalment of the sci-fi action romp that pits humans against some big, bad alien robots, the Decepticons. In this sequel, which manages to be even louder and more prone to explosions than the initial outing, Sam Witwicky (Shia LaBeouf) and his girlfriend Mikaela Banes (Megan Fox) are once more at the centre of the action. Witwicky is being hunted down by the Decepticons, who recognise that he is the main impediment to them gaining control of an awesome source of energy. As the Decepticons' plan would result in the destruction of the sun, mankind's fate rests on the shoulders (and in the ingenuity) of our oddly named hero... Edited for language and violence(n)

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: FBI agents investigating a series of bank robberies initially suspect that the business's owner might be responsible, but they later realize that the heists point toward a much-larger conspiracy in this taut crime thriller(n)

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive
programme.desc: Visceral horror thriller in which the mechanical devices in the town of Wilmington, North California, start to go dangerously haywire. Eventually, the surviving inhabitants gather in the town's diner, besieged by malevolent driverless trucks which seem intent on destroying everything and everyone. Horror master Stephen King's directorial debut(n)

programme.title: On Time
programme.desc: A woman who is running late for a job interview is forced to make a tough decision. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2016 American Black Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Sugar
programme.desc: Filmmakers Ryan Fleck and Anna Boden (Half Nelson) weave this introspective sports drama concerning a talented Dominican baseball player who longs to break into the American big league and earn the money needed to support his impoverished family. Miguel Santos is a talented pitcher who might just have what it takes to earn a prized spot on a Major League Baseball team, but before that happens he'll have to prove his worth in the minor leagues. Advancing into the United States' minor league system at the tender age of 19, Miguel is warmly welcomed into the small-town Iowa home of his host family, but can't help but struggle with language and cultural barriers despite the kindness of strangers. Subsequently forced to reevaluate his life's ambition after his once-trusty arm becomes unreliable, the previously single-minded pitcher gradually begins to question both the world he lives in and the role he has chosen to play in it(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Stephen Glass is a staff writer for the respected - current events and policy magazine - The New Republic, and a freelance feature writer for Rolling Stone Magazine and others. By the mid-90s, Glass' articles had turned him into one of the most sought-after young journalists in Washington D.C., but a bizarre chain of events suddenly stopped his careers path. Nominated for four Independent Spirit Awards and a Golden Globe(n)

programme.title: Species II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi blockbuster. After becoming the first person on Mars, astronaut Patrick Ross is infected with spores of alien DNA, resulting in a dangerously inflamed libido and an outbreak of alien offspring. Elsewhere, the monster who wreaked havoc in the original film has been cloned and united with government assassins in order to track down Ross and eliminate the new species(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes: The Homecoming
programme.desc: Rob Lowe and Shawn Roberts star in this sequel following an Iraq War veteran who is plagued by terrifying visions after returning home(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Mark Steven Johnson's violent superhero fantasy-morality play stars Ben Affleck as Matt Murdock, a guilt-wracked blind vigilante with a penchant for red leather. During his childhood, an accident involving toxic waste blinded Murdock, but it also enhanced his other senses and gave him a kind of 'radar vision'. The incident was partially caused by his discovery that his father was involved with the Mob. Now, the adult Murdock, spurred partly by Catholic guilt over his role in his father's death, has dedicated this life to fighting crime and protecting the innocent. By day Murdock's a defence lawyer, but by night he dispenses summary justice to criminals who've escaped the courts. Things get complicated when he falls in love with Elektra Natchios (Jennifer Garner). Not only is she the daughter of a man with connections to New York crime bosses but, unknown to Murdock, she's also a vigilante who's equally keen on figure-hugging leather (black in her case). And when Daredevil is framed for the murder of her father, Elektra swears vengeance on the masked crime-fighter (not realising that he's her lover). Meanwhile, both of them are in mortal danger from the actual killer, a merciless Irish assassin called Bullseye (Colin Farrell)(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Buckle up for a wild ride as Paul Walker ("Joy Ride") and Vin Diesel ("Pitch Black") put the pedal to the metal in this high-octane action thriller. Diesel plays the leader of a gang of L.A. street racers who moonlight in highway robbery; Walker is the undercover cop who befriends him. Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster, Rick Yune, Chad Lindberg(n)

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: San Francisco Police Inspector 'Dirty' Harry Callahan and his new partner, Early Smith have been temporarily reassigned from Homicide to Stakeout Duty. Meanwhile, those of the city's criminals who manage to avoid punishment by the courts are nevertheless being killed by unknown assassins. Callahan begins to investigate the murders despite the orders of his superior officer, Lieutenant Briggs. A man has to know his limitations..(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: A macho cop goes undercover as a schoolteacher as part of his efforts to prosecute an elusive drug dealer, but quickly finds out he's no match for a roomful of feisty 6-year-olds(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Everyone knows it takes an Undercover Brother to foil The Man. This time, The Man has launched Operation Whitewash, a plot to undermine an African-American general's presidential ambitions. But with the Undercover Brother (Eddie Griffin) on the case, alongside his sexy sidekick, Sistah Girl (Aunjanue Ellis), the general is sure to see the inside of the Oval Office. The 70's fashion-fabulous duo dons the latest in country club attire to infiltrate The Man's plan and root out his evil accomplice the White She Devil (Denise Richards)(n)

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: Explosive action-adventure in which Sylvester Stallone plays a cop on the warpath, who sets out to stop a band of murderous criminals who are threatening to bring the city to its knees(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalise Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results(n)

programme.title: Half Past Dead
programme.desc: Steven Seagal stars in this explosive thriller as an undercover FBI agent trying to infiltrate a powerful crime syndicate. He goes above and beyond the call of duty when he lands in prison, where he also works to thwart an inside job to steal millions of dollars in lost gold. Ja Rule, Morris Chestnut, Nia Peeples, Kurupt, Tony Plana, Matt Battaglia, Stephen J. Cannell, Richard Bremmer(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her(n)

programme.title: Bird on a Wire
programme.desc: Quick-witted and fast-paced action-comedy: Mel Gibson, his cover blown after years on the FBI Witness Protection Program, finds his life threatened by a murderous gang of drug dealers. Charitably, he drags ex-girlfriend Goldie Hawn into the deadly milieu and together the pair set off on a crazy cross-country adventure(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: Endlessly imitated, The Terminator made the reputation of cowriter/director James Cameron -- who would go on to make 1997's titanic Titanic -- and solidified the stardom of Arnold Schwarzenegger. The movie begins in a post-apocalyptic 2029, when Los Angeles has been largely reduced to rubble and is under the thumb of all-powerful ruling machines. Kyle Reese (Michael Biehn), a member of the human resistance movement, is teleported back to 1984. His purpose: to rescue Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton), the mother of the man who will lead the 21st-century rebels against the tyrannical machines, from being assassinated before she can give birth. Likewise thrust back to 1984 is The Terminator (Schwarzenegger), a grim, well-armed, virtually indestructable cyborg who has been programmed to eliminate Sarah Connor. After killing two "Sarah Connors" who turn out to be the wrong women, he finally aims his gunsights at the genuine article. This is the film in which Schwarzenegger declared "I'll be baaaack" -- and back he was, in "kinder and gentler" form, in the even more successful Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991)(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: In debt to a gangster, petty criminal Gerard Butler pulls off a heist that has repercussions in the underworld. Guy Ritchie caper. Strong language/violence/mature themes. (2008)(110 mins)(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Office worker Wesley learns not only that his dad was a lethal hitman, but also that he's inherited the same skills(n)

programme.title: Traders
programme.desc: A man's business goes under, threatening to derail his posh existence. In a desperate attempt to keep his life as he knows it, he agrees to cash out his entire life savings and put it all on the line in a diabolical, winner-takes-all fight to the death(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: The true story of one of America's most violent and infamous gangsters, Whitey Bulger. Johnny Depp stars as Bulger, who was the brother of a state senator and was eventually convinced to wear a wire for the FBI to bring down the Italian mafia in Boston after they invaded his territory. Scott Cooper directs, with Mark Mallouk penning the screenplay based on Dick Lehr and Gerald O'Neill's 2001 best-seller Black Mass: The True Story of An Unholy Alliance Between The FBI and The Irish Mob(n)

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror about a half-human, half-alien female mutant who escapes from a government laboratory and attempts to prolong the life of her species by mating with a human. Pursued by scientists and police, she passes through a chrysalid stage and takes on the appearance of a beautiful young woman. But she can also metamorphose from her eye-catching form into a repulsive, death-dealing monster(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In Washington, D.C., in the year 2054, murder has been eliminated. The future is seen and the guilty punished before the crime has ever been committed. From a nexus deep within the Justice Department's elite Precrime Unit, all the evidence to convict - from imagery alluding to the time, place and other details - is seen by Pre-Cogs, three psychic beings whose visions of murder have never been wrong. It is the nation's most advanced crime force, a perfect system. And no-one works harder for Precrime than its top man, Chief John Anderton. Destroyed by a tragic loss, Anderton has thrown all of his passion into a system that could potentially spare thousands of people from the tragedy he lived through. Six years later, the coming vote to take it national has only fuelled his conviction that Precrime works. Anderton has no reason to doubt it... until he becomes its #1 suspect(n)

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: A cop receives lots of media attention when he nabs an infamous, sadistic killer at an amusement park. The murderer stews in jail for seven years, obsessively following the rising career of his arresting officer, who becomes a DA with a promising future, a husband, and a dad. This doesn't sit well with the vengeful convict, who after escaping from prison, puts into play a series of fiendish plots in an attempt to destroy the attorney's marriage and career..(n)

programme.desc: The Brotherhood of the Blood. Protecting Christ's blood is the sworn mission of an ancient and mysterious group(n)

programme.desc: John Wesley Hardin - The Dark Heart of Texas. John Wesley Hardin (1853-95) becomes a notorious cattle rustler in Texas and Kansas in the 1870s, known for his bad temper and habit of settling quarrels with his gun(n)

programme.desc: The Hollywood Syndicate. The Church of Scientology; and the Sony Pictures Entertainment cyber-attack are examined(n)

programme.desc: Lone Wolves. A Vietnam War sniper takes on covert missions, a man recovers illegally seized cargo ships(n)

programme.desc: The Heroes of Tarawa. The November 1943 Marine assault on the Japanese Pacific island stronghold of Tarawa is examined(n)

Louise tells Bex she has a date with Travis.(n)

programme.title: Kat and Alfie: Redwater
programme.desc: The Moons' search takes a positive turn this week as Kat finally meets her son. But will this be the happy-ever-after she has been hoping for? Elsewhere, Agnes organises a memorial barbecue, although she is not happy when the Moons show their faces, while Eileen comes to realise how much she and Kieran are missing in America, prompting her to wonder whether she should stay in Ireland permanently. Drama, starring Jessie Wallace, Shane Richie, Fionnula Flanagan and Angeline Ball.(n)

programme.title: Frank Skinner on Muhammad Ali
programme.desc: The comedian learns more about his hero, boxing icon Muhammad Ali, by visiting key locations and people in his life. In Ali's hometown of Louisville, Kentucky, he meets the boxer's brother Rahman and his former wife Khalilah, who was alongside him in the turbulent years when he was banned from the ring for refusing to fight in Vietnam. Frank also meets a bare-knuckle boxer from Oxfordshire who became one of Ali's dearest friends, and visits the Pennsylvania training compound where Ali and his team prepared for the Rumble in the Jungle. With contributions from Nicola Adams, Larry Holmes and Ali's business manager Gene Kilroy.(n)

programme.title: Question Time

programme.sub-title: Jonty Hearnden v James Braxton Showdown.
programme.desc: Jonty Hearnden takes on James Braxton for a final time in the showdown, and everything is at stake as they set out to each buy eight items at four different locations, before the auction determines who has invested the most wisely.(n)

programme.title: Pointless
